About me

Hung Le Thanh loves programming, writing, speaking, traveling, and learn new things. He does not love talking about himself in the 3rd person. Previously, he worked as a Tech Evangelist at Google Developer Group Hanoi. For more info, check out his writing, speaking, projects, and photos.
